text: The Outsider is a 1961 American World War II biographical movie directed by Delbert Mann and was based on the article by William Bradford Huie. It stars Tony Curtis, James Franciscus, Bruce Bennett, Gregory Walcott, Vivian Nathan, Paul Comi, Forrest Compton and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 war movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:American biographical movies Category:American war movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Delbert Mann
title: The Outsider (1961 movie)
